v2.0.0
Change effect management architecture
Handle boblight lights
Update tests

v1.0
Python 3.5 targetted
Refactor server with sockerserver framework
Change Licence to MIT

===== Rename to Hyperion2Boblight =====

v2.0
Run on python 3.4
Remove XBMC compatibility
Add unit testing
Configure setuptool to be able to package it
Allow a cleaner way to shutdown each thread

v1.0
Renamed effect Mood to Rainbow
First working prototype

v0.5
Added support for common hyperion commands:
	- color
	- clear
	- clearall
Added support for one effect : Mood

v0.1
Initial revision
